name: @tpmjs/tools-unsandbox
description: Execute code in a secure sandbox environment. Supports 42+ programming languages with async execution, input files, and compiled artifacts.

tools.name: executeCodeAsync
tools.description: Execute code asynchronously in a secure sandbox. Returns a job_id immediately. Use getJob to check status and retrieve results. Supports 42+ languages.

tools.name: execute
tools.description: Execute code synchronously in a secure sandbox. Waits for completion and returns results directly. Best for quick scripts.

tools.name: run
tools.description: Execute code synchronously with automatic language detection via shebang (e.g., #!/usr/bin/env python).

tools.name: runAsync
tools.description: Execute code asynchronously with automatic language detection via shebang. Returns job_id for polling.

tools.name: getJob
tools.description: Get the status and results of an async code execution job by job_id.

tools.name: listJobs
tools.description: List all active code execution jobs with their current status.

tools.name: deleteJob
tools.description: Cancel an active code execution job by job_id.

tools.name: getLanguages
tools.description: Get list of all supported programming languages with their metadata including extensions, version, and capabilities.

tools.name: getShells
tools.description: Get list of available shell interpreters (bash, zsh, etc.) with their versions and capabilities.

tools.name: createSession
tools.description: Create a new persistent session with configurable language, resources, and networking. Sessions maintain state across executions.

tools.name: getSession
tools.description: Get details of a session including status, resource usage, and configuration.

tools.name: listSessions
tools.description: List all sessions with optional filtering by status (active, frozen, locked).

tools.name: executeInSession
tools.description: Execute code in an existing session. State and files persist between executions.

tools.name: freezeSession
tools.description: Freeze a session to pause execution and reduce resource usage while preserving state.

tools.name: unfreezeSession
tools.description: Unfreeze a frozen session to resume execution.

tools.name: lockSession
tools.description: Lock a session to prevent modifications or deletion.

tools.name: unlockSession
tools.description: Unlock a locked session to allow modifications.

tools.name: createSessionSnapshot
tools.description: Create a snapshot of the current session state for backup or cloning.

tools.name: restoreSession
tools.description: Restore a session from a snapshot.

tools.name: deleteSession
tools.description: Delete a session and release all associated resources.

tools.name: createService
tools.description: Create a long-running service with persistent state, networking, and auto-restart capabilities.

tools.name: getService
tools.description: Get details of a service including status, endpoints, and resource usage.

tools.name: listServices
tools.description: List all services with optional filtering by status.

tools.name: executeInService
tools.description: Execute a command or code snippet in a running service.

tools.name: freezeService
tools.description: Freeze a service to pause execution while preserving state.

tools.name: unfreezeService
tools.description: Unfreeze a frozen service to resume execution.

tools.name: lockService
tools.description: Lock a service to prevent modifications or deletion.

tools.name: unlockService
tools.description: Unlock a locked service to allow modifications.

tools.name: redeployService
tools.description: Redeploy a service with updated configuration or code.

tools.name: getServiceLogs
tools.description: Get logs from a service with optional filtering by time range and log level.

tools.name: createServiceSnapshot
tools.description: Create a snapshot of the current service state.

tools.name: getServiceEnv
tools.description: Get environment variables configured for a service.

tools.name: setServiceEnv
tools.description: Set or update environment variables for a service.

tools.name: deleteServiceEnv
tools.description: Delete an environment variable from a service.

tools.name: deleteService
tools.description: Delete a service and release all associated resources.

tools.name: createSnapshot
tools.description: Create a snapshot from any source (session, service, or existing snapshot).

tools.name: getSnapshot
tools.description: Get details of a snapshot including metadata and creation info.

tools.name: listSnapshots
tools.description: List all snapshots with optional filtering by source type.

tools.name: lockSnapshot
tools.description: Lock a snapshot to prevent deletion or modification.

tools.name: unlockSnapshot
tools.description: Unlock a locked snapshot to allow modifications.

tools.name: restoreSnapshot
tools.description: Restore a session or service from a snapshot.

tools.name: cloneSnapshot
tools.description: Clone a snapshot to create a new independent copy.

tools.name: deleteSnapshot
tools.description: Delete a snapshot and free associated storage.

tools.name: publishImage
tools.description: Publish a snapshot as a reusable image for spawning new sessions or services.

tools.name: getImage
tools.description: Get details of a published image including metadata and access info.

tools.name: listImages
tools.description: List all images with optional filtering by visibility and ownership.

tools.name: lockImage
tools.description: Lock an image to prevent modifications or deletion.

tools.name: unlockImage
tools.description: Unlock a locked image to allow modifications.

tools.name: grantImageAccess
tools.description: Grant access to a private image for specific users or API keys.

tools.name: revokeImageAccess
tools.description: Revoke access to an image from specific users or API keys.

tools.name: transferImage
tools.description: Transfer ownership of an image to another user.

tools.name: setImageVisibility
tools.description: Set image visibility to public or private.

tools.name: spawnFromImage
tools.description: Spawn a new session or service from an image.

tools.name: getImageTrustedKeys
tools.description: Get list of API keys that have access to a private image.

tools.name: deleteImage
tools.description: Delete an image and free associated storage.

tools.name: healthCheck
tools.description: Check the health status of the Unsandbox API service.

tools.name: getClusterStatus
tools.description: Get status of the execution cluster including node availability and capacity.

tools.name: getSystemStats
tools.description: Get system statistics including resource utilization and job metrics.

tools.name: listPools
tools.description: List available execution pools with their configurations and current status.
